pageContent: Objective: To assess whether the use of complementary and alternative medicines therapies (CAMs) for prostate cancer and/or its treatment side effects by long-term survivors is associated with selected socio-demographic, clinical, health-related quality-of-life (HRQOL) and/or psychological factors.

metaData.source:
Late effects after radiotherapy for prostate cancer in a randomized dose-response study: results of a self-assessment questionnaire
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/9609638/
